name: Super Mario 64 Custom Level
summary: An LVL64 file is a custom game level created by SM64 ROM Manager, a Super Mario 64 ROM modding tool. It contains one or more 3D objects used to replace a default Super Mario 64 level, as well as level settings. Modders can export LVL64 files from SM64 ROM Manager's Level Manager, to back up or share levels.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.

images.caption: LVL64 file open in SM64 ROM Manager
